Posts.Content: They say 2A and Grade 3.....not too sure if i understand that....my breast 1.5......mastasized lymph node 3.4mm...25 taken....1 bad.she said the margin was okay...but that there were some sprinkles outside it....so now that I'm healing nicely...and would like to go ahead and start treatments....I have to wait.Because next friday of next week she wants to go in and try another margin....I pray to God it's clean if not she said she'll close me up I'll heal in couple weeks and start chemo...and during chemo I should think about getting my breast out afterwards.So please pray that this margin will be clean.
Posts.Title: when saving the breast, might lose it anyway
